title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: But I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". It is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: The expected behavior is for the output to be "MySomeClass".
